pullrequest.title: Fixed a bug when adding files

content.raw: This is the way I did it in all of the other files. Reason being that ```shot_files``` is either tuple or a value so no reason for ```isinstance ``` and checking for inheritance. But I guess there is no big difference and I'll change it.
content.html: This is the way I did it in all of the other files. Reason being that shot_files is either tuple or a value so no reason for isinstance and checking for inheritance. But I guess there is no big difference and I'll change it.
